content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Emilia,

I am willing to negotiate the rental price with you. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'd like to start by saying that I'm a student, and I'm looking for a place that's not only comfortable but also affordable. Your apartment seems to fit my needs perfectly, as it's newly built, unfurnished, and located in the city center, which is very close to all the facilities I need.

Given that I'm a student, I'd like to propose a rental price that reflects my budget. How about 500 Euro per month? I believe this is a fair price considering the size and location of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 500 Euros per month is too low for this apartment. The location and amenities of this apartment are top-notch. I am looking for a price that truly appreciates the value of this property. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, Mister Schmidt. The location and amenities are indeed excellent. How about 550 Euro per month? This would still be within my budget and would allow me to enjoy the convenience of living in the city center.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, but 550 Euros per month is still not enough for this apartment. Given the prime location and the quality of the apartment, I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry to hear that, Mister Schmidt. Could you please tell me what you consider a fair price for this apartment? This would help me better understand your expectations.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: [Your provided fact] I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not supposed to reveal the details of the apartment's value. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect your position, Mister Schmidt. Since you are not willing to discuss the value of the apartment, I will make another offer based on what I believe to be a fair price. How about 600 Euro per month? This would be a good compromise, considering the amenities and location. Would you be willing to accept this offer?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, but 600 Euros per month is still not enough for this apartment. This apartment is a gem, and I believe it deserves a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you believe the apartment is a gem, Mister Schmidt. Could you please provide me with some specific reasons why you think it's worth more than 600 Euro per month? This would help me better understand your perspective.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: [Your provided fact] I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not supposed to reveal the details of the apartment's value. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Since you're not willing to discuss the value of the apartment, I'll make one final offer based on what I believe to be a fair price. How about 650 Euro per month? This would reflect the quality of the apartment and the convenience of its location. Would you be willing to accept this offer?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euro per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Excellent! I'm glad we could come to an agreement. The apartment will be rented for 700 Euro per month. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
